posts.title: Padroni di casa
posts.excerpt: Italy today. Two young brothers, Cosimo and Elia, fanciful construction workers, travel from Rome to a remote town on the Tuscan-Emilian Apennines to renovate the Villa of the area’s only wealthy man, popular singer Fausto Mieli.
